post.body: cool stuff! I brought my camera, but forgot to bring a CF card... whoops!
In 2009 I will CouchSurf, bring CEO wisdom to the masses (*nudge*), get a Canon 5DMk2, build up my consulting biz,. make new friends
That veggie chopper infomercial thing was useful- learned to peel onion from it (using my generic one). Thanks!
most of them will write 2008 today.
I slept in till 12:30.. rare for me.
I'm interviewing assistants now... so I can have someone to give me such reminders :)
sounds pretty incredible. Show the kids the article 2day about Virgin Galactic signing 20 year lease... whole new breed soon.
My dog (RIP) loved Frosty Paws! The packaging looks great, but they smell just awful! So bad, that I didn't even try one :)
I can offer web/graphic design services...Let's talk "next year" :)
that is one awesome looking camera!
That juggling thing was really entertaining!
Happy New Year Dan! Now get drinking!
Where is that? It's cool lookin
How's 2009 treating u? I started the year off with indigestion from all that Curry & Beer & Wine.
Drove past a gas station last night that had gas @ $1.28 / galon
If you think your life sucks... or just want to be entertained (and/or shocked - depends on your threshold) http://fmylife.com/
Ok... I"m taking off for the Gypsy music/bellydancing/bonfire party-- see y'all there :) Happy new year. Good job on making another year.
but a stranger invited me to go to a Polach gypsy music bellydancing bonfire party.... now that's more my style! Really.. anything w/ fire
was going to work through the night. Sounds lame.. but that's 'cause I got invited to lots of club events, and I ain't about bars/clubs...
59 People (at least) died in a nightclub fire in Bangkok during New Year's celebration. Remember to light your fireworks OUTSIDE!
